short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GiiispAI Plugin is a powerful conversational tool based on a large language model

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GiiispAI Plugin is a powerful conversational tool based on a large language model, designed to provide users with convenient dialogue and sentence splitting functionality. Whether you need to quickly ask questions while browsing the web or split text into sentences, our plugin can meet your needs. With just a few simple steps, you can easily enjoy the convenience brought by these features.
